name: Team Works
description:
Game made for Brakeys game jam 2022.2. This is not completed yet because I have made this in 5 days. But after rating i can add more levels, better gameplay.

How to play : 

Because I don' t make the tutorial so here is how to play.

WSAD to move. Click on pet to control it. Click on player to control him.

Pet is a cube which is very small so he can enter small gates
